title: Google\Cloud\Firestore\V1beta1\StructuredQuery_CollectionSelector
name: StructuredQuery_CollectionSelector
description:
A selection of a collection, such as messages as m1.

Generated from protobuf message google.firestore.v1beta1.StructuredQuery.CollectionSelector

Extends \Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

methods.name: getCollectionId
methods.description:
The collection ID.

When set, selects only collections with this ID.

methods.name: getAllDescendants
methods.description:
When false, selects only collections that are immediate children of the parent specified in the containing RunQueryRequest.

When true, selects all descendant collections.

Generated from protobuf field bool all_descendants = 3;
